item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, September 4, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC

1. Russia built covert trade channel with India, leaks reveal
2. Nvidia leads US market sell-off as weak data feeds slowdown fears
3. Volvo Cars ditches pledge to sell only electric cars by 2030

5. Zelenskyy makes biggest shake-up of Ukraine’s wartime government
